OOC: Dewboy, if you can stop being stupid for more than 0.113 nano seconds,=
 then you'd understand that G1 is what caused the birth of Beast Wars and B=
east Machines. No matter where you go, if it's any kind of a Transformers b=
oard/RPG, you're going to hear about G1, the great thing that started it al=
l. Beast Wars, in my opinion, got old after a while, but I welcome it as pa=
rt of Transformers since it made since (Except for "Go with the Flow"). BM,=
 however, was Bob Skir's lame attempt to make people like him. If BM had no=
thing at all to do with Transformers, it might have been cool. Well, one go=
od thing about BM, the toys didn't attempt to destroy history. I'm not sayi=
ng G1 didn't have it's flaws, but you trying to tell you that it's moronic =
to try to talk about Beast Wars and Beast Machines without having to hear s=
omething about G1 when most of the hardcore fans grew up watching G1. And i=
f I recall, Dewboy, YOU started this...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: dewboy30816 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, March 0=
6, 2002 2:57 PM
  Subject: Re: G1


  Then stop pounding on BW and BM I joi=
ned this group because I'm a 
  BEAST WARS fan and I wanted to talk about B=
EAST WARS I don't care 
  about freakin' G1.

 i gotta 
  make an exception for you, dew. you're an idiot. plain and simp=
le.

, 
  they cursed, but it was a theatrical release! 2 curse words! 
  woooow=
ww! i can definately see the problem now! God! why weren't more 
  parents =
in an uproar about this satan spawned movie! call jerry 
  falwell!
  > any=
way...if your abvously young ass watched any post movie eps of 
  g1 
  > (=
which, let's be real here, you didn't.)
  > you'd know that the leader afte=
r hot rod was then fort max. you 
  need to lay off g1 or find another cont=
inuity to follow.
